comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Oberleutnant Friedrich Ritter von Röth (29 September 1893 – 31 December 1918) was a German World War I fighter ace with 28 victories. He was the most successful German pilot at shooting down enemy observation balloons; 20 of his triumphs were against them. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Friedrich_Ritter_von_R%C3%B6th
